


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.http -->

# ```js SRequestConfig ```


Class that represent an ajax request that will be passed to an SRequest instance.
All the axios settings are supported by this class



## Example (js)

```js
const request = new SRequestConfig({
 	url : '/api/...',
 	method : 'GET',
 	data : {
 		myVar : 'myVal'
 	}
});
```
